rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3159, 3843, 4401, B6013}
Must be enrolled in course version {3159, 3843, 4401}

description: Under supervision students are expected to undertake and report on an original research project that addresses a significant issue (or issues) in business law; this research proposal is likely to have substantial practical outcomes or implications; as well, it is hoped that students and supervisors will publish the work in an appropriate peer-refereed journal.
